original_text: for even when I was in Thessalonica, you sent me aid more than once when I was in need.
korean_text: 데살로니가에 있을 때에도 너희가 한 번뿐 아니라 두 번이나 나의 쓸 것을 보내었도다

sentences.original_text: for even when I was in Thessalonica
you sent me aid more than once
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 여러 번 나에게 도움을 보내주었기 때문이며
